content: Aayush is a research Assistant at IIT-Delhi. Aayush is interested in working in Deep learning with application in computer vision domain (more specifically in video analytic and surveillance). I feel that there is wide scope and impact in this domain. Aayush developed my interest in deep learning while pursuing my masters. Aayush is impressed by the impact of deep learning in solving vast problems in various domain and it motivates me to be a part of journey and able to contribute in same. Aayush want to work in a research labs or start my own startup.
summary: Aayush is a research Assistant at IIT-Delhi. Aayush is interested in working in Deep learning with application in computer vision domain (more specifically in video analytic and surveillance). I feel that there is wide scope and impact in this domain.
title: Aayush Kumar Tyagi
